question: Chaina sets 2018 GDP target at around __________.
explanation: China has set its GDP growth target at around 6.5% for 2018, unchanged from that for 2017. The projected growth rate reflects China's position of not over-emphasizing speed but stressing improvements in the quality and effect of development. Chinese economy outperformed its annual growth target by expanding 6.9 percent last year, picking up for the first time in seven years.
